Translations.Text: geuleona uiloun jadeul-eun seungli han geos-i issnani
cheonguggwa pododeul-i issgo
naiga gat-eun cheongsunhan baeuja ga iss-eumyeo
neomchineun jan-i issdoda
geudeul-eun geugos-eseo eotteon mu-ig han daehwana geojisdoen maldo deudji ani hamyeo
junim-ui gyesan-e ttala bosang-eul badnola
haneulgwa daejiwa geu saie iss neun manmul-ui junim-isin gajang jabilo un hananimkke eoneu nugudo geubun-ui neunglyeog-e gyeonjuji moshalila
yeonghongwa cheonsadeul-i ap-eulo jul jieo seoneun geunal jabilousin hananim-ui heolag-eul eod-eo sasil-eul malhal ja oeeneun eoneu nugudo malhal su eobsnani
geunal-i jinliui nal-i doel geos-ila geuleomeulo wonhaneun janeun geulo hayeogeum junimkke gwiuitolog halila

sillo hananimkkeseo neohuiege dagaol eungbeol-e gwanhayeo gyeong-gohaessnaniingan-eun geuga haenghan geu haeng-wideul-eul jikyeobol geunal bulsinjadeul-eun jeoege jae ang-i issnani chalali \xC3Deulo dol-a gass-eumyeon hago malhalila
saaghan jadeul-ui yeonghon-eul ganglyeoghage kkeul-eoganeun cheonsadeul-eul dugo maengse hasa
chugbogbad-eun jadeul-ui hyeonghon-eul budeu leobge indohaneun cheonsadeul-eul dugo maeng sehamyeo
gyesileul jeondalhaneun cheonsaleul dugo maengsehamyeo
gyeongjuhayeo indohaneun cheonsadeul-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
hananim-ui myeonglyeongdeul-eul suhaenghaneun cheonsadeul-eul dugo maengsehanani
eoneunal dong-yohage doel modeun geos eun keuge dong-yohago
dwileul ieo dong-yoga banbogdoedoda
geunal-ui ma-eumdeul-eun dugeungeoligo
geudeul-ui nundeul-eun mit-eulo cheogjyeoiss eumyeo
jeohuiga sillo ijeon-ui sangtaelo dol-agal su issneunyo lago malhamyeo
uliga bupaehan ppyeodeulman namneun dedo geuleohaneunyo
geulihamyeon geugeos-i sillo ilh-eun gwiloga doelila malhadeola
geuleona geugeos-eun dan hanbeon-i doel geos-ila
geuttae geudeul-eun simpan-eul wihayeo kkaeeona issji anhneunyo
mose-ui iyagiga geudaeege ileuleossneunyo
